VIII.i.3.C.7.a
.
General Relationship Eligibility Requirements of an Individual
To be eligible for Chapter 18 benefits, the individual must be the natural child of a Veteran with qualifying service.
Important
:  VA requires more than a written statement to establish parentage.  A birth certificate will
always
be required.
Note
:  Specific relationship requirements exist, separately, for spina bifida benefits and other covered birth defects benefits.
References
:  For more information on
the specific relational requirements for benefits for
spina bifida benefits, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, 3.C.7.d
, and
other covered birth defects, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, 3.C.7.e
the Vietnam service requirement, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, 3.C.3
the Korean service requirement, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, 3.C.4
, and
the Thailand service requirement, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, 3.C.5
.
